# Browina, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Browina  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kozłowo, within Nidzica County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  north of Kozłowo,  north-west of Nidzica, and  south-west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
